FIG. 3A shows an IC₅₀ for LIF inhibition in U-251 cells using the h5D8 antibody.
FIG. 3B shows representative IC₅₀ dose response curves of r5D8 and h5D8-1 inhibition of pSTAT3 under endogenous LIF stimulation conditions. 
FIG. 7B shows data from mice inoculated with luciferase expressing human U251 GBM cells and then treated with 100, 200 or 300 μg of h5D8 or vehicle twice a week. 
FIG. 8C illustrates that h5D8 shows a significant reduction in tumor growth when administered at 200 μg/mouse twice weekly (p<0.05).
